meta.title: Labs: Real Projects
meta.summary: This can be referenced  along your Pythonic development journey.

content:
Whats inside?

Notebooks mostly made by me. Two articles are from students from this past program I helped with

These are their finished articles:

  1. Social Media Alert System for COVID-19 Illicit Behavior

  2. Exploration of Data Works MDS Membership

  3. Is Baltimore City Getting Fast Enough Internet Speeds?

  4. An Analysis of Baltimore City E-Scooter Distribution

Featured

NB to HTML Tests – Testing workflows for converting notebooks to HTML. Notes


Looking at Data – Exploratory techniques for inspecting raw datasets. Notes


Satellites – Pulls and serves satellite data. Notes


Mapping the Parks – Analysis and modeling involving the data collected that outlines a park. Notes


Wordclouds – Generating and customizing word cloud visualizations. Notes


Survey Word Clouds – Natural language processing on survey data. Notes


211 Web Scraper – Targeted scraping tasks for course 211-related data. Notes
